data: It was about a month after the foregoing conversation took place, that Melbourne society was fluttered by a rumour that the engagement between Mr. Kingston and Miss Fetherstonhaugh, which had been unaccountably broken off, was “on” again, and that the long-delayed wedding was to take place immediately.
A Mere Chance: A Novel. Vol. 3
